pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta-Analysis of Medians // Implements several methods to meta- analyze one-group or two-group studies that report the median of the outcome. In the one-group context, the methods of McGrath et al. (2018a) doi:10.1002/sim.8013 estimate the pooled median. In the two-group context, the methods of McGrath et al. (2018b) arXiv:1809.01278 estimate the pooled raw difference of medians across groups.
